sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Col, Row} from 'antd' import {Description} from '../atoms' import {useStore} from 'effector-react' import {useTranslation} from 'react-i18next' import {Text} from '../../../UIComponents/Typography/Text' import {SkeletonUI} from '../../../UIComponents/GlobalStyles' import {$offeringsModel} from '../../../Models/offerings-model' import {truncateString} from '../../../utils/stringUtils' export const OfferingDescription = () => { const {t} = useTranslation() const [truncate, setTruncate] = useState(false) const {$offeringInfo: {data, forceLoading}} = useStore($offeringsModel) console.log() return ( {`${t('description')}:`} { forceLoading === 2 ? ( { !truncate ? {truncateString(data?.description, 150)} setTruncate(true)}>{t('more')} : {data?.description} setTruncate(false)}>{t('less')} } ) : ( <> ) } ) }
